Package org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HadoopConnectingMapReduceService
    A union of HadoopConnectingService and HadoopMapReduceService that specifies all operations needed to: Connect to Hadoop cluster and validate that connection.
    HadoopCounterDisplayNameGetter<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    Represents a function that returns counter display name for given Enum that identifies Hadoop map/reduce counter.
    HadoopJobReporter
    Defines a service for obtaining information about Hadoop map/reduce job that is/was executed on Hadoop cluster.
    HadoopMapReduceInfoService
    A service provided in addition to HadoopConnectingMapReduceService.
    HadoopMapReduceService
    Service that allows to send map/reduce job specifications to the Hadoop cluster (specifically to jobtracker of the cluster) where the jobs specified are executed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HadoopCounterGroup
    Represents named and ordered collection of HadoopCounterKey instances.
    HadoopCounterKey
    Represents Hadoop map/reduce job counter.
    HadoopCounterKeyValuePair
    Represents Hadoop map/reduce counter key/value pair where key is identification of Hadoop counter.
    HadoopMapReduceConnectionData
    Represents set settings that are required to create connection to jobtracter of Hadoop cluser.
    HadoopMapReduceJob
    Represents basic configuration of Hadoop map/reduce job.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HadoopMapReduceJob.APIVersion
    Enum representing versions of map/reduce job implementation APIs.
